document_data.name: Nightviper Venom
document_data.refs3e: {{Cite dragon/293/Elminster's Guide to the Realms: The Missing Minotaur|75}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Nightviper venom''' was a [[poison]] extracted from the fangs of the [[nightviper]], a [[snake]] found in the [[Nelanther Isles]]. It was harvested by [[pirate]]s and sold to merchants in [[Skullport]] and [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Description: This milky white liquid had a slightly sweet taste. It could be mixed with water or alcohol and still retain its potency. It could also be administered through an open wound caused by a weapon treated with this substance. A single dose typically cost 600 gp.
document_data.Effects: Unless the victim was hardy enough to resist, this poison impaired a victim's judgement. Effects ranged from merely reducing inhibitions and making bad choices to falling into a complete stupor.
document_data.Notable Users: [[Elsk Thavarask]], the proprietor of the [[Missing Minotaur]] tavern in [[Everlund]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]], was known to use this substance on occasion, and perhaps sell it to people he trusted.
